name: Dr. U and the bottomless PIT
name_original: Dr. U and the bottomless PIT
description:
Dr. U and the bottomless PIT

Try to fall as long as you can.
Use your umbrella to float and smack some bats.
Avoid the walls and traps.
Whistle along.

Controls
W / Up = Pick up phone / Open umbrella
S / Down = Close umbrella
A / Left = Steer left
D / Right = Steer right
Space = Attack

Made in 72 hours for the ludum dare jam 32

by @farwyler, @shakemeluzifer, @bmuig
